name: Open-dosing-pump
body: # Open Source Dosing Pump ======================= ----------- THIS PROJECT IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT. ----------- Open Source,DIY, easy to assemble, peristaltic dosing pumps, with parts soruced from eBay and Aliexpress, that requires no soldering. Originally designed to be controlled by an Aquarium Controllier, like the Invent Marine Reefmate. ### Features 1. 4 pumps 2. Communication via Bluetooth or USB. 3. Easy to use calibration workflow. 4. Scheduled doses. 5. Integrated float switch for ATO. 6. Integrated temperature sensors. 6. Estimated cost: Around $95 Our goal is to release the hardware, software and enclosure designs of an Dosing Pump that we have been building at Invent Marine. ### Sponsor Proudly sponsored by Invent Marine ### Collaborators @fsamir Franklin Dattein Become a collaborator yourself. We are after PCB designer, software developers, industrial designers and UX designers.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
